Data: Behardien to Finch, no run played off the front foot towards midwicket
Behardien to Finch, no run good length on off, the bowler dives to his left to stop Finch's drive
Behardien to Finch, 2 runs Finch backs away far outside leg to try and hit on the off side, Behardien cramps him for room and the result is an inside edge that goes past leg stump and the keeper
Behardien to Finch, 1 run driven to long off for a single
Behardien to Warner, no run he's bowling a mix of slower balls, Warner plays this one back to Behardien
Behardien to Warner, no run stays in his crease and defends on the off side, tight length from Behardien on off stump

Morkel to Finch, no run run out chance at the bowler's end! Finch tapped the ball on the off side with a bottom edge, QDK ran towards the slip region to collect the ball and threw it at the bowler's end, direct hit would have sent Warner back because he had come down a long way f
Morkel to Finch, no run outside off on length, pushed straight to point
Morkel to Finch, no run 141kph, beauty! That one angled in from just outside off on back of length, Finch looked to defend but the ball held its line a bit and just missed the outside edge
Morkel to Finch, 2 runs towards the pads now, it's tucked towards short fine leg for a quick single and an overthrow at the bowler's end gets them another
Morkel to Finch, 1 run back of length outside off, taps it late towards third man

Morkel to Warner, no run attempts a slog and takes a blow on the body! Warner stopped low a bit for the back of length delivery from leg stump but he failed to connect and an edge went on to hit him on the back of his head under the helmet
Behardien to Finch, FOUR runs short of length and angled towards leg, Finch guides it fine down the leg side for a delicate four
Behardien to Finch, no run slightly straighter, Finch drives on the off side but the edge goes back to the bowler
Behardien to Finch, no run outside off on length, guides it late but to point
Behardien to Finch, no run fuller outside the off stump, drives fiercely off the front foot and straight to cover
Behardien to Finch, 1 run well outside off again, Finch cuts it late to beat short third man but Morkel dives to his right to save a few runs
Behardien to Warner, no run offcutter from off stump and going away, pushed off the back foot to cover
Morkel to Finch, 1 run 138.7kph, pushes the length delivery towards mid-off, the fielder dives to get a hand to it and deflects it and they sneak in a run
Morkel to Warner, no run slower at 129kph, on the pads and it's clipped to midwicket
Morkel to Warner, 2 runs 126.5kph, it's a bouncer towards off stump, Warner waits and pulls it towards deep backward square leg for two
Morkel to Warner, no run back f length towards middle from leg, 138kph and Warner goes back to defend it to cover
Morkel to Warner, (no ball) makes room for the back of length delivery, not much room as he defends ton off and it's a no ball for overstepping
Morkel to Warner, 2 runs short ball on the leg side, Warner pulls it off the toe of the bat and it just clears midwicket, gets two
Morkel to Warner, SIX runs that's high in the air, has he timed it well enough, he has and it's gone for six! Fullish outside the off stump, he got under it and lofted it over long off for six
Behardien to Finch, 1 run slightly full on middle, driven down the ground to long on
Behardien to Warner, 1 run pushes the offcutting delivery from outside off to deep cover
Behardien to Finch, no run brings it in a bit from outside off, Finch taps it towards point
Behardien to Finch, 1 run angled in towards middle and leg now, flicked past midwicket for one
Behardien to Warner, 2 runs shorter delivery on the pads, tucked away to deep backward square leg
Behardien to Warner, no run full on the pads now, driven straight to midwicket this time
Philander to Finch, no run on length outside off, Finch shuffles across a bit and turns it towards short midwicket, the fielder throws it at the keeper's end but Finch is back in time
Philander to Finch, no run length delivery outside off, pushed off the back foot towards cover
Philander to Finch, SIX runs too short, that's another six from Finch! He spotted the short ball outside off, rocked back and smacked it with a pull over deep square leg
Philander to Finch, no run full and outside off, driven firmly in the air and it falls short of cover
Philander to Finch, (no ball) back of length outside off, pulled to midwicket and that's another no ball
Philander to Finch, FOUR runs moves across the stumps, and the full delivery well outside off is smacked down the ground over mid on for a four
Philander to Finch, no run on length outside off, he leans forward to defend this time. And that's drinks
Tahir to Warner, 2 runs length delivery outside off, Warner sweeps it to fine leg for two
Tahir to Warner, no run edges in the air, but it's far from short third man! Looked like a googly outside off, Warner slogged and got a thick edge
Tahir to Warner, FOUR runs full outside off again, not a googly and Warner smacks it over the covers for four this time
Tahir to Warner, 2 runs fuller on middle and leg, pushed down towards long on with soft hands and they get two
Tahir to Warner, no run quicker one outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Tahir to Warner, FOUR runs he goes down on a knee and sweeps the length delivery from outside off in the air to the fine leg region for four. That's the 100 for Australia
Philander to Finch, no run shapes it away a bit from outside off, Finch drives it to cover
Philander to Finch, 1 run on length and closer to off, pushed down the ground to long on
Philander to Warner, 1 run makes some room and drives the full delivery from middle down to long off
Philander to Finch, 2 runs shorter outside off, Finch pushes it to cover where AB misfields a bit and it's not too far from him, but they come back for the second as well
Philander to Finch, no run shorter outside off, swishes it to point
Philander to Finch, 1 run well outside off again and that's driven through the covers for one, fifty for Finch
de Villiers to Finch, no run brings it in towards middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
de Villiers to Finch, FOUR runs fuller towards the pads and it's glanced fine down the leg side off the bat for four more
de Villiers to Finch, no run back of length on middle stump, Finch defends it back
de Villiers to Finch, no run shorter and wider outside off, punched to cover
de Villiers to Finch, no run full and well outside off, driven off the front foot to cover
de Villiers to Finch, 1 run slower at 107kph, full on middle stump and driven down to long on
Philander to Finch, no run outside off on length, pushed into the covers
Philander to Finch, 1 run shapes it away a bit from outside off, tapped a bit wide of backward point for one
Philander to Warner, no run low full toss outside off, pushes it back to the bowler
Philander to Warner, FOUR runs too short and wide, it's slow at 113.5kph, Warner waits for it by going on the back foot and crashes it between point and cover point for four, that's his fifty
Philander to Warner, no run close to the off stump on length, pushed off the front foot towards cover
Philander to Warner, OUT taken at midwicket! It was a length delivery on middle and off, Warner slogged it without much footwork and AB at midwicket had to jump a bit to take the flat catch
Steyn to Finch, no run angled into the batsman, Finch clips it to short fine leg
Steyn to Finch, 1 run angled into the batsman with a full delivery, flicked in the air over midwicket
Steyn to Watson, no run 142kph, on length outside off, he defends off the back foot to point
Steyn to Watson, no run fullish delivery outside off, driven firmly down the ground but Steyn stops it
Steyn to Watson, 1 wide slides it down the leg side for a wide
Steyn to Watson, no run cuts it in from just outside off, inside edge off the drive goes to midwicket
Steyn to Watson, no run on length and cutting in again, he defends on the leg side
Philander to Finch, no run
Philander to Finch, FOUR runs that's too full and Finch lofts it with such ease to the wide long on boundary for a one-bounce four
Philander to Finch, no run shorter outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Philander to Finch, no run shapes it away a bit from outside off, he pushes it off the front foot on the off side
Philander to Finch, 1 run short of length outside off, Finch swats it down to long on for one
Philander to Watson, 1 run straighter delivery on off stump, pushed down the ground to long off
Steyn to Watson, 1 run brings the ball in from short of length, helped to fine leg for one
Steyn to Finch, no run cutting in again towards the batsman, tucked to midwicket
Steyn to Finch, 1 run outside off now on back of length, pushed off the back foot into the covers
Steyn to Watson, no run stretches forward and drives the length delivery into the covers. Slightly wobbled seam
Steyn to Watson, no run 136.5kph, cutting in towards the batsman, Watson defends it on the leg side
Steyn to Watson, no run angled in towards middle and leg, tucked towards mid on this time
Morkel to Finch, 1 run starts with a full delivery outside off, drives it down to long off
Morkel to Watson, no run length delivery outside off and it's driven off the front foot to cover
Morkel to Watson, no run stretches out and defends the length delivery to cover
Morkel to Watson, 2 runs fuller and angled in, glanced off the pads wide of fine leg for two
Morkel to Watson, no run slightly full outside off, punched down t mid off off the front foot
Morkel to Watson, FOUR runs too short and wide, Watson stays back and chops it over point in the air for a four to beat third man
Tahir to Finch, no run bit of flight towards middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
Tahir to Finch, no run he tries to sweep the delivery from leg but takes it on the pad
Tahir to Finch, no run fullish on middle and leg, connects the sweep to fine short fine leg
Tahir to Finch, 1 run makes a lot of room this time and punches it through the covers for one
Tahir to Watson, no run straightish on middle stump, Watson defends it back
Tahir to Watson, 1 run comes down the track and drives it to long off for one
Morkel to Watson, FOUR runs full outside off and that's been driven back with some power for four. It was not a conventional drive, he whipped his wrists to send it past the bowler
Morkel to Watson, 1 run low full toss outside off, pushed down to long off easily
Morkel to Finch, no run back of length outside the off stump, he stays back to defend it
Morkel to Finch, FOUR runs too full outside off, Finch launches it straight down the ground to the long on region for another aerial shot. One bounce four
Morkel to Finch, 2 runs back of length outside off, tapped wide of point and it's in the gap for two quick runs. Excellent running

Morkel to Finch, 1 run in the air again, fall short of third man! It was a full delivery outside off, Finch drives in the air again, a leading edge goes high towards third man and there was nearly a misjudgement for the ball to slip through for four
Tahir to Finch, 1 run full toss on middle, pushed down to long on for one
Tahir to Watson, no run length delivery on off stump, leans forward to block it
Tahir to Watson, 1 run goes on the back foot to push the length delivery to long off
Tahir to Finch, 1 run full on middle stump, flicked away to deep midwicket
Tahir to Watson, 1 run full on off, pushed delicately past the bowler to long on
Tahir to Finch, no run flighted and loopy on leg stump, pushed to midwicket
de Villiers to Watson, 1 run short of length outside off, swatted towards deep point
de Villiers to Finch, 1 run short on middle and it's pulled to deep midwicket for one
de Villiers to Watson, SIX runs too short this time and Watson pulls it for six! Watson had enough time to see the length and crash it wide of deep midwicket
de Villiers to Watson, no run slightly straighter and he defends it back
de Villiers to Watson, 1 run cutting in from outside off, pushed down to long off for one
Tahir to Watson, 1 run slightly full and pushed down to long on
Tahir to Finch, 1 run full on the stumps, driven down to long off
Tahir to Watson, FOUR runs slower on the leg stump, it's slightly full and Watson sweeps it against the turn to beat short fine leg and deep backward for four
Tahir to Watson, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, pushed down to long on
Tahir to Finch, 1 run flighted on middle stump, slog-swept to deep midwicket in the air for one
Tahir to Watson, 1 run goes on the back foot and pushes the shorter delivery from outside off to long on
de Villiers to Watson, 1 run too full on middle and leg, slogged on the leg side for one
de Villiers to Finch, SIX runs full on the off stump and Finch crashes it to his favourite area for today - wide long on, and that's gone for six!
de Villiers to Finch, 1 run fullish on middle, pushed down to long on for one
de Villiers to Watson, FOUR runs short again outside off and that's pulled to deep midwicket for four more!
de Villiers to Watson, no run quicker on length outside off, chopped straight to point
de Villiers to Watson, 1 run just outside the off stump, pushed down to long off
Steyn to Watson, no run back of length outside off, pushed off the front foot to cover
Steyn to Watson, 1 run short of length and angled in, tucked to deep square leg
Steyn to Finch, no run swings it in from length outside off, Finch defends it back
Steyn to Finch, no run 138kph, length delivery, right on target, outside off and Finch defends it back
Steyn to Finch, 1 run straighter towards middle stump, flicked away to deep midwicket for one more
Steyn to Watson, 1 run back of length and swinging in again, eased down to long on for one
Behardien to Watson, 1 run length delivery on the off stump, turned to the leg side for one
Behardien to Finch, 1 run slower one on length around off, pushed down to long on

Behardien to Watson, OUT he's got Watson again! Behardien pitched it slightly shorter outside off, Watson slogged on the leg side but didn't get enough of it and long on went to his right to take the skier
Behardien to Finch, 1 run full and slow around off, punched down to long off
Behardien to Smith, no run fullish outside off, steers the ball to short third man
Behardien to Smith, no run swing and a miss! It was well outside off, Smith reached out towards the ball to drive but could not connect
Tahir to Finch, no run flat on the stumps, chopped on the off side
Tahir to Finch, 1 run full and outside off, Finch makes room and steers it to sweeper cover
Tahir to Smith, no run flighted on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
Tahir to Smith, no run outside off now and it's pushed to cover off the front foot
Tahir to Smith, 1 run full on the pads, flicked to the leg side for one
Tahir to Finch, 1 run googly comes in sharply from outside off, swatted to deep midwicket for one and that's drinks
Behardien to Finch, no run even wider outside off, driven to deep cover off the front foot
Behardien to Finch, 1 run even wider outside off, driven off the front foot to deep cover
Behardien to Smith, no run around length outside off, pushes it to cover
Behardien to Smith, 1 run goes on the back foot for the slightly shorter delivery to tuck it to leg for one
Behardien to Finch, no run on length outside off, drives it to cover
Behardien to Finch, 1 run shorter and slower outside off, he waits for it and pushes it towards long on
Tahir to Finch, no run full and flighted outside off, driven firmly but straight to cover
Tahir to Finch, no run leans forward and defends the ball on off
Tahir to Finch, FOUR runs makes room, the googly was shorter and Finch crunched it off the back foot through the square region on the off side for four
Tahir to Finch, FOUR runs quicker on middle and leg, he makes room again and finds the gap again! Punched it with a drive past cover point and point, now on 99
Tahir to Finch, 1 run full and pushed, misfield from Tahir and Finch gets his hundred. That's his fifth in ODI, comes from 117 balls and he's put on a strong platform for the middle order
Tahir to Smith, 1 run comes down the track and flicks the ball towards square leg
Behardien to Smith, 1 run too full and wide, Smith swings his arms to send it to sweeper cover for one
Behardien to Finch, no run fullish on the off stump, pushed down to the bowler
Behardien to Finch, 1 run slower at 103.6kph, eased down to long on for one
Behardien to Smith, no run on length outside off, driven straight to cover
Behardien to Smith, no run squares him up a bit as the ball somewhat stopped after pitching and he pushed it back to the bowler
Behardien to Smith, 1 run on length outside off, tucked to the leg side to deep midwicket for one
de Villiers to Smith, no run stifled appeal for lbw as the ball cut in and hit him in front of leg but was going down
de Villiers to Smith, 1 run cutting in again towards the batsman, helped to short fine leg
de Villiers to Finch, 1 run short of length towards off and middle, pushed down to long off for one
de Villiers to Smith, 2 runs fuller on off stump, eased down to long on and they come back for the second because long on thought that it was only one
de Villiers to Smith, no run outside off on length, he defends it back
de Villiers to Smith, 1 run sliding towards leg stump, flicked towards short fine leg where a dive saves a couple of runs
Philander to Smith, 1 run swinging in from off stump, helped to the leg side for one
Philander to Finch, 1 run back of length and outside off, tapped to point off the back foot
Philander to Smith, no run on length and just outside off, pushed towards midwicket
Philander to Smith, FOUR runs makes room, then shuffles across and whips it on the leg side flamingo style in the air to beat deep midwicket and he gets four
Philander to Smith, FOUR runs one more - this one was well outside off and third man was in, Smith tapped the ball late enough to beat the man in the circle and take four more
Philander to Smith, 1 run slower one at 109.6kph, jabs it to backward point for one
de Villiers to Smith, no run short of length outside off, tucked to midwicket
de Villiers to Smith, 3 runs slower and fuller on middle and leg, he glances it delicately down the leg side for two in the gap before Tahit cuts it back
de Villiers to Finch, 1 run makes room and cuts the ball to deep backward point
de Villiers to Smith, 1 run shorter and slower outside off, dabs it to backward point for one more
de Villiers to Finch, 1 run angled in towards middle and leg, he makes room and slices it to short third man where Morkel dives to save some more runs
de Villiers to Smith, no run cuts it in a bit towards off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Philander to Finch, 1 run attempted swinging yorker on middle and leg, punched down to long on
Philander to Smith, FOUR runs full on off, Smith eyes the gap behind square on the leg side and whips it with the wrists to the leg side for four
Philander to Smith, 1 run slower at 113kph outside off, tapped towards point for one
Philander to Finch, 1 run full toss well outside off, steered to deep point for one
Philander to Smith, 1 run fullish well outside off, turned with the wrists to long on
Philander to Finch, 2 runs too full and that's been driven firmly down the ground for two
Steyn to Marsh, 2 runs yorker on the stumps, pushed down the ground to long on for two quick runs
Steyn to Marsh, FOUR runs full and wide outside off, Marsh swings his arms and finds the gap through the covers with a big drive to beat long off for four
Steyn to Marsh, 2 runs full toss on leg stump, worked to deep midwicket and two more quick runs
Steyn to Marsh, 2 runs yorker on the leg stump, pushed down to long and they scamper for two more, good running
Steyn to Marsh, 1 run hint of inswing outside off, nearly a yorker, driven on the off side
Steyn to Smith, FOUR runs slower one at 122kph well outside off, Smith maybe expected that and went down on a knee to nearly sweep it to the fine leg boundary for four
Morkel to Marsh, 2 runs fullish on off stump, he wanted to loft it straight down the ground but didn't get enough and managed it over the bowler's head for two

Morkel to Marsh, OUT he's played the wrong line and lofted it high for an easy catch to AB at long off! It was angled in a bit towards middle and leg, but he lofted it inside out, very high and AB took it with rather ease
Morkel to Smith, 2 runs goes across and whips the ball to fine leg as it was pitched up and that's his fifty
Morkel to Smith, 1 run full delivery well outside off, tapped to backward point for one
Morkel to Wade, 1 run full and angled away, steered to sweeper cover off the front foot for one
Morkel to Smith, FOUR runs super shot, he'll get four for that! It was pitched up outside off, Smith middled that as he nearly went down on a knee and smacked it to the boundary with a glorious drive
de Villiers to Smith, 1 run shortish outside off, heaved to the leg side for one

de Villiers to Finch, OUT AB's got the big wicket of Finch! Regular length delivery on the off stump, Finch went for a wild slog on the leg side and missed it completely. The ball crashed in to off and middle stumps
de Villiers to Bailey, no run short of length towards the stumps, tucked to midwicket
de Villiers to Bailey, no run outside off on short of length, taps it to short third man
de Villiers to Bailey, 2 runs back of length just outside off, swatted down to long on for one
de Villiers to Bailey, 1 run short on the stumps, pulled to deep midwicket for one
Steyn to Bailey, no run swinging in from length outside off, pushed to cover
Steyn to Bailey, no run slower at 120kph on length outside off, taps it late to point
Steyn to Bailey, 1 run swinging in a bit at 136kph, pushed down to long on for one
Steyn to Smith, 1 run back of length outside off, thick outside edge goes towards cover for one
Steyn to Bailey, 1 run fullish on the off stump, soft defence on the off side for a quick single
Steyn to Smith, 1 run outside the off stump on back of length, dabs it down to third man for one. They considered the second but decided against him
Steyn to Wade, 1 run fullish and wide outside off, he drives hard and gets a run to third man
Steyn to Smith, 1 run he makes room, Steyn pitches it short and Smith pulls it to deep midwicket
Steyn to Wade, no run close to off stump on length, Wade tries to work it on off but misses
Steyn to Wade, 1 run charges down to swat it on off but gets a bottom edge for a quick single
Steyn to Smith, FOUR runs inswinging yorker around off, Smith goes back in the crease and whips it again with the wrists to beat fine leg for four
Steyn to Smith, no run low full toss outside off, Smith tries to work it on leg but misses
Morkel to Wade, 3 runs angled across the off stump, Wade comes down to slog it on the leg side but gets an inside edge past the stumps on the leg side and they run well for three

Morkel to Smith, 2 runs that's gone high, that's going for six, but it's been pulled back by Faf as he jumped back from long on at the boundary, got a hand to it in the air and kept the ball inside. Outstanding effort!
Morkel to Smith, FOUR runs full toss this time outside leg and Smith whips it to the fine leg boundary for four this time
Morkel to Smith, (no ball) 2 runs full again, it's lofted down the ground and Faf runs in from long on to take a great catch with his right hand, celebrates too but it's a no ball
Morkel to Smith, FOUR runs shuffles across off and stays in the crease, whips the full ball with the wrists in between his legs to the leg side for four! He's played this shot too often today
Morkel to Smith, 1 run outside off, he pokes it to point for one
Morkel to Wade, 2 runs short of length outside off, swishes it to cover where Miller dives to save a couple of runs

Steven Smith: The wicket slow down in the end and the ball became softer. I tried to get a few boundaries and managed to get a few away. The start we got was perfect and the openers set the foundation for a good score.

6pm Runs were expected on this pitch and Australia have amassed 329 with the help of Finch's fifth hundred. Warner go a quick fifty, Watson scored 40 and once the pitch slowed down it was Steven Smith's unusual innings of 73 that charged them past 300, and to 329. They were 241 after 40
6.35pm Out come Amla and de Kock, here begins the chase of 330 runs. Mitchell Starc will start
Starc to Amla, 1 run outside the off stump, runs it down to third man for one
Starc to de Kock, no run outside off on length, pushed on the off side
Starc to de Kock, no run outside off on length, QDK pushes it back
Starc to de Kock, 3 runs width on the off side and WDK caresses it along the ground through covers. They ran two easily and there was a mix up for the third, but they reached eventually
Starc to Amla, no run length delivery outside the off stump, driven to cover point
Starc to Amla, 1 run cuts it uppishly form outside off, the ball flies away to third man after a couple of bounces
Hazlewood to Amla, no run stays a bit low as it swings away from length outside off and goes under Amla's bat as he pushed at it
Hazlewood to Amla, FOUR runs too wide this time, was short too and Amla punched it off the back foot through the point region for a cracking four
Hazlewood to Amla, no run length delivery on off stump this time, Amla defends it back
Hazlewood to Amla, no run fuller on the off stump, no room at all and Amla pushes it back again
Hazlewood to Amla, FOUR runs bit too wide again and Amla is not going to let it go, drives it beautifully through the covers this time for four
Hazlewood to Amla, no run fullish close to off stump, pushed on the off side
Starc to de Kock, no run brings it in towards off stump, QDK defends it back
Starc to de Kock, no run 145kph, straight delivery on the stumps, QDK defends to short midwicket
Starc to de Kock, FOUR runs too short and QDK pulls it late to send it fine down the leg side for four. Fine leg in the circle and QDK does well to beat him
Starc to de Kock, (no ball) fullish outside off and it's pushed into the covers. No ball for overstepping
Starc to de Kock, no run 147.3kph, right in the block hole, the stumps have gone all over as QDK made room to slog. Starc smiles and goes back to his run up
Starc to de Kock, no run angled in towards middle and leg, tucked to the leg side
Hazlewood to Amla, FOUR runs full and angled into the pads, Amla absolutely middles that and sends it crashing on the leg side with a flick for four
Hazlewood to Amla, 2 runs short this time, Amla pulls and it goes over midwicket for two runs, could have been three
Hazlewood to Amla, no run on length outside off, Amla swings and misses as the ball nipped in after pitching
Hazlewood to Amla, no run back of length outside off, Amla goes back to defend it on off
Hazlewood to Amla, no run fuller outside off, punched off the back foot to point
Hazlewood to Amla, no run 141kph, brings in the back of length delivery and Amla defends again
Starc to de Kock, no run length delivery outside off, slices it to cover point
Starc to de Kock, no run on length on the off stump, QDK defends it back to the bowler
Starc to de Kock, no run 145.3kph, full and swinging in from outside off, blocked back to the bowler
Starc to de Kock, no run full on the stumps this time, pushed down gently towards mid on
Starc to de Kock, 1 run further towards the leg side, flicked to deep midwicket off the pads
Starc to Amla, FOUR runs too full on the pads and that's flicked in the air for four to the midwicket boundary
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run angled across outside off, QDK leans forward and blocks it
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run touch fuller outside off, pushed down to mid off
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run 139.6kph, outside off with the angle again, driven into the covers
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run bangs in the short ball with cross seam, QDK looked to pull initially but it bounced too much and beat him by pace
Hazlewood to de Kock, 1 run on length around off with the angle, tucked to midwicket and there's an unnecessary overthrow to give them one
Hazlewood to Amla, FOUR runs too full on the pads, that's a poor delivery and Amla flicks it again with his wrists for four. This time to the fine leg boundary
Watson to de Kock, 1 run 124kph, length delivery outside off chopped to third man for one
Watson to Amla, 1 run back of length just outside off, worked off the back foot with the wrists to the leg side
Watson to de Kock, 2 runs 120.5kph, towards the off stump, QDK has enough time to go back and whip it on the leg side for two
Watson to de Kock, 1 run fuller outside off, pushed down softly towards mid off for one
Watson to Amla, no run back of length outside the off stump, dabs it to point off the back foot
Watson to Amla, no run appeal for lbw as the ball came in from outside off but it hit him pretty high in front of the stumps
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 2 runs back of length and coming in, worked on the leg side off the back foot in the gap
Kane Richardson to de Kock, no run fuller on the stumps, drives it down to mid on
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 2 runs goes shorter again, QDK stays back and works it past midwicket for two more
Kane Richardson to de Kock, FOUR runs he's been bowling too short, this time QDK waits for it and flicked it from around off to the fine leg boundary for four
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 1 run touch wider of off, similar length and QDK works it to deep square leg again
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run shortish outside off, Amla taps it off the back foot wide of point for one
Watson to Amla, 1 run on length towards off and middle, flicked to deep midwicket for an easy one
Watson to de Kock, 1 run just over short cover! It was angled across a bit from off, QDK wants to work it to leg but played it early and a leading edge went over short cover for one
Watson to Amla, no run outside off and it's pushed down to mid off
Watson to Amla, no run short ball, it's pulled and falls well short of short fine leg
Watson to Amla, FOUR runs he gets room and punches it off the back foot through the off side for four! Stayed on the back foot and caressed it between point and cover point
Watson to Amla, 1 run short of length outside off, dabbed towards point
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run back of length outside the off stump, he defends it off the back foot
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run 138.7kph, touch fuller outside off, pushed into the covers
Kane Richardson to Amla, 2 runs length delivery coming in from outside off, he drives and a thick inside edge goes to deep midwicket for two
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run back to back of length, square-drives it late to point
Kane Richardson to Amla, FOUR runs width on offer and Amla drives it beautifully through the covers. It was not a powerful drive, but he timed it so well it went all the way for four
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run edged and doesn't carry! Outside off, Amla pushes but it keeps low and takes a bottom edge
Doherty to de Kock, no run fullish on off stump, worked with the turn to midwicket
Doherty to de Kock, no run touch shorter and it's pushed to the leg side again
Doherty to de Kock, no run outside off and it's reverse swept to backward point
Doherty to de Kock, 1 run shorter delivery outside off, chopped off the back foot to sweeper cover
Doherty to Amla, 1 run flighted on middle, driven down to long off for one
Doherty to de Kock, 1 run full and flighted on the off stump, driven down to long on
Kane Richardson to de Kock, no run slightly short and angled across, pulled to midwicket
Kane Richardson to de Kock, FOUR runs charges down this time and smacks it in the air on the leg side by taking it on the full. Four runs as there's nobody in the deep
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 1 run on the pads now and flicked to deep backward square leg for one
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run short of length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run fuller outside the off stump and it's driven through the covers for one
Kane Richardson to de Kock, SIX runs too short and QDK picks the short boundary at fine leg for six! Short outside the leg stump, QDK rocked back and smacked it high over fine leg
Doherty to Amla, no run touch short outside off, chopped to point
Doherty to Amla, 1 run full on the pads, eased to deep midwicket for one
Doherty to de Kock, 1 run on length outside off and turning in, QDK leans forward and works it to leg with the spin
Doherty to Amla, FOUR runs shorter and flatter outside off, enough room and time for Amla to cut it past point for four! Great timing to beat the off side fielders
Doherty to Amla, 1 run fuller on the stumps, pushed down to long on for one
Doherty to de Kock, no run turns it in nicely from well outside off, QDK goes on the back foot and cuts it towards point
Marsh to Amla, no run full on the stumps, driven down to mid on
Marsh to Amla, 1 run full on the pads, clipped in the air to deep midwicket with the wrists
Marsh to de Kock, no run full outside the off stump, pushed down to mid off
Marsh to de Kock, 1 run makes room by going to the leg side and swishes at the ball to clear cover, but he got a hand to it
Marsh to Amla, no run swings and misses! Didn't move his feet much for the widish delivery outside off, he chased and didn't connect
Marsh to Amla, 1 run short ball outside off, pulled with some power to deep midwicket for one
Doherty to Amla, 1 run flighted on the off stump, drives it down to long off
Doherty to de Kock, 1 run takes a step down and works the ball to long on
Doherty to Amla, no run loopy and full on middle again, pushed to short cover this time
Doherty to Amla, 1 run bit of flight outside off, Amla frees his arms with a drive to sweeper cover and that's his fifty
Doherty to de Kock, no run flighted and full well outside off, tries the reverse sweep and is hit on the back foot
Doherty to de Kock, FOUR runs the orthodox sweep is much better and he gets for four that. Went down on a knee and played it with the spin to beat a running fine leg fielder in the deep
Marsh to Amla, 2 leg byes short ball angled in towards Amla, pulls it off the back foot to fine leg
Marsh to Amla, 1 run full toss on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for one
Marsh to de Kock, 1 run full on the stumps, taps it close to the pitch on off for a quick single
Marsh to Amla, no run drives it outside off without much footwork and the inside edge rolls down to leg
Marsh to Amla, no run slower and fuller at 119.2kph, he taps it to point
Marsh to Amla, 1 run angled in towards the batsman, worked to deep midwicket for one
Doherty to Amla, 1 run comes down the track and pushes the ball to long on, and that's SA's 100
Doherty to de Kock, 1 run turning in from outside off, takes a step down to work it to leg and a fumble at midwicket from Smith concedes a single
Doherty to Amla, no run straight on middle, Amla defends it back
Doherty to Amla, 1 run touch shorter outside off, whipped off the back foot to leg
Doherty to de Kock, no run flatter and quicker outside off, he gets an inside edge while trying to cut it
Doherty to de Kock, no run comes down and takes it on the full to drive it to cover
Watson to Amla, 1 run angled into the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for one
Watson to de Kock, 1 run slower at 125kph outside off, taps it towards short cover point for one
Watson to Amla, 1 run 127.3kph, eased to deep midwicket with the angle for one
Watson to de Kock, 1 run 113kph, slower and lower from the leg side, QDK pulls it to the leg side
Watson to Amla, 1 run 118kph, angled towards the stump, worked to the leg side for one more
Watson to de Kock, no run 130kph, fuller on the off stump, pushed back uppishly to the bowler. Time for some drinks
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 run length delivery outside the off stump, tapped towards third man for one

Hazlewood to de Kock, OUT doesn't connect the pull well and a leading edge goes high, caught around short third man! QDK pulled the short delivery from leg but got a top edge which went very high and Marsh had to run back from backward point for the catch
Hazlewood to Amla, no run cutting in from outside off, Amla blocks it back
Hazlewood to Amla, no run shorter outside off, dabs it late to point
Hazlewood to Amla, no run on length wider outside off, punched off the back foot to point
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 run goes back and works it on the leg side for one
Watson to Amla, 1 run angled in from off, worked off the pads behind square on the leg side
Watson to du Plessis, 1 run back of length outside off, square driven to deep point for one
Watson to Amla, 1 run waits in the crease and flicks the ball to deep square leg for one
Watson to du Plessis, no run on length now outside off, Faf defends it on the off side
Watson to du Plessis, 1 run slower at 120.5kph and full on the stumps, driven to mid on for one
Watson to Amla, 1 run 112.6kph, fullish and wide, driven away from the body to sweeper cover
Doherty to Amla, 1 run fullish outside off, driven down to long off for one
Doherty to du Plessis, no run angled in towards middle and leg, worked to midwicket
Doherty to du Plessis, 1 run takes a step down and flicks the delivery on leg
Doherty to Amla, no run flatter on the stumps, pushes it back to the bowler
Doherty to Amla, 1 run slower on length around off stump, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
Doherty to du Plessis, no run bit shorter outside off, pushed to cover
Marsh to Amla, 1 run back of length outside off, steered off the back foot to deep backward point
Marsh to du Plessis, FOUR runs takes a step down, Marsh tries a yorker but it's a low full toss on the pads and he flicks it away behind square on the leg side for four
Marsh to du Plessis, no run 130koh, that keeps low after pitching on length outside off as Faf tried to slice it
Marsh to du Plessis, 1 run 117.6kph, cuts in the slower ball from around off, clipped to the leg side for one
Marsh to Amla, no run slow offcutter again, Amla defends it off the back foot
Marsh to Amla, no run firm drive off the low full toss on off, Marsh gets a hand to it and saves a few
Doherty to du Plessis, FOUR runs comes down the track, takes it on the full and whips it from middle stump to find the gap between deep midwicket and long on for four
Doherty to du Plessis, no run fuller on the stumps, pushes it back to Doherty
Doherty to du Plessis, 1 run shorter on the stumps, worked off the back foot to leg
Doherty to Amla, no run comes down and pushes the length delivery to cover
Doherty to Amla, 2 runs shorter and much wider, punched off the back foot and Finch runs to his left fro sweeper cover to cut it to two
Doherty to Amla, 1 run back in the crease and works the ball to leg for one
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run fullish outside off, driven straight to short cover
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run cuts it in a bit from outside off, pushed down to mid off for a quick single
Kane Richardson to du Plessis, 1 run short delivery just outside off, pulled to deep midwicket for one
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run too full and outside off, driven firmly, but straight to short cover
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run touch wider outside off, driven nicely along the ground to sweeper cover for one
Kane Richardson to du Plessis, 1 run shorter and outside off, pushed down to long off for one
Marsh to du Plessis, no run keeps low after pitching on short of length, pushed to cover
Marsh to du Plessis, 1 run angled into the batsman, worked to fine leg off the pads for one
Marsh to Amla, no run fullish outside off, Amla drives it off the front foot to mid off
Marsh to Amla, 1 run much shorter towards off stump, pulled to square leg for one
Marsh to du Plessis, 1 run tries to work the ball to leg off the back foot and gets an inside edge onto the front thigh pad for one
Marsh to Amla, 1 run touch fuller and it's steered to the leg side for one more
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run short of length outside off, taps it to backward point
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run stifled appeal as Amla is struck towards the leg side but it's going down
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run shorter outside off, slices it off the back foot to deep backward point for one
Kane Richardson to du Plessis, 1 leg bye another lbw appeal, the umpire says no again! It came in sharply from outside off, Faf went back and on his toes and the ball was mising leg for sure
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run short ball outside off, runs it down to third man for an easy single
Kane Richardson to du Plessis, no run he looks to pull the ball from off, but misses
Marsh to Amla, no run shortish outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
Marsh to Amla, 1 run fuller on the stumps, it's flicked to deep square leg for one
Marsh to du Plessis, no run keeps a bit low, it was well wide outside off and Faf pushes it to cover point
Marsh to Amla, 1 wide full and down leg past the batsman for a wide
Marsh to Amla, no run length delivery on middle stump, steered to midwicket
Marsh to Amla, 1 run full toss on the pads, flicked to deep backward square for one. No time for the second
Starc to Amla, 1 run angled in towards the stumps, flicked to leg for one
Starc to Rossouw, no run full outside off, pushed down to mid on
Starc to Rossouw, no run hint of inswing as the ball comes in, he defends it back
Starc to Rossouw, no run fullish outside the off stump, pushed into the covers
Starc to Rossouw, 2 runs inside edge off the drive goes past the stumps to fine leg
Hazlewood to Amla, no run cuts it in from back of length outside off, Amla defends it on off
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 run much fuller and wider outside off, driven firmly through the covers for one
Hazlewood to de Villiers, no run stifled appeal first ball as the ball comes in shsrply from just outside off but it struck him outside leg and was going down further
Hazlewood to de Villiers, 2 runs well outside off now and that's swished to sweeper cover to get off the mark
Hazlewood to de Villiers, no run back of length outside off, chops it late to short cover
Hazlewood to de Villiers, 1 run angled in this time towards middle and leg, pushed down the ground on the leg side
Starc to de Villiers, no run comes down the track and swings his arms to drive it to cover
Starc to de Villiers, FOUR runs he charges down again, mid off is in, and he clears the fielder with a powerful hit down the ground for four
Starc to de Villiers, no run shuffles across and drives the length delivery to cover
Starc to de Villiers, 1 run shorter outside the off stump, pushed off the back foot to off for one
Starc to Amla, 1 run angled in and it's worked off the pads towards midwicket
Starc to de Villiers, no run length delivery outside off, AB can't clear cover
Watson to Amla, FOUR runs slow and well outside off, Amla has enough time to drive it beautifully through the covers for four
Watson to Amla, 2 runs goes on the back foot and works it towards deep backward square leg for two
Watson to Amla, no run outside off and it's punched to cover
Watson to Amla, no run 116kph, slow and straight on the stumps, he defends it back
Watson to Amla, 3 runs chips it down the ground, doesn't middle it but he connects well to clear mid on and Doherty slides near the boundary to save a run
Watson to de Villiers, no run length delivery is straight on the stumps and he defends it back
Marsh to Amla, no run shapes it in from outside off towards the stumps, Amla defends it back
Marsh to Amla, no run falls short of mid off! Amla drove it down the ground, but it was a slower one. Starc came in but it was out of his reach
Marsh to Amla, 2 runs bit too full outside off, driven firmly through the covers and Warner runs fro sweeper cover to slide and save it
Marsh to Amla, 2 runs fullish towards leg now and it's lofted to the wide long on boundary in the gap for two more
Marsh to Amla, 1 run touch short of length around off, worked off the back foot to fine leg for one
Marsh to de Villiers, 1 run AB moves across to sweep the pace bowler, misses, and is struck outside off as the bowler appeals. There was an inside edge too
Watson to de Villiers, FOUR runs 113kph, slower and pretty full outside off, AB drives it in the air through the covers for four!
Watson to de Villiers, 1 run charges down and smacks the delivery to long off
Watson to Amla, 1 run full outside off, driven down towards mid off for one
Watson to de Villiers, no run angles it in towards middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
Watson to de Villiers, FOUR runs shuffles across and whips it away to the wide long on boundary for four! It was on back of length, he went back in the crease and used his wrists to turn it to leg
Watson to de Villiers, SIX runs that's a six to end the over! He went down on a knee and swept the delivery to the fine leg region for six! Time for drinks
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run back of length outside off, taps it to backward point
Kane Richardson to de Villiers, no run short of length outside off, pushed down the ground to mid on
Kane Richardson to de Villiers, no run goes back and across a bit and pushes the ball down to mid on
Kane Richardson to de Villiers, 1 run comes down this time and drives it down to long on for one
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run back of length and cutting in towards the stumps, inside edge gets him a single
Kane Richardson to de Villiers, 1 run shorter and coming in, pulled to square leg for one
Marsh to de Villiers, 1 run makes room for the short delivery and slaps it down the ground to long off
Marsh to Amla, 1 run length delivery outside off, Amla doesn't move much and swishes it to deep cover
Marsh to de Villiers, FOUR runs full and outside off, AB goes for a full swing of his arms and gets a leading edge over point and gets four. Nobody in the deep there
Marsh to de Villiers, FOUR runs shuffles across this time, goes down on a knee for the shorter delivery and paddles it fine down the leg side for another four!
Marsh to de Villiers, FOUR runs three in a row! Drives the length delivery outside off and he guides the ball uppishly between shortf third man and backward point for four
Marsh to de Villiers, 2 runs straighter delivery and whips it this time wide of fine leg for two in the gap
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run outside off, Amla slices it to short third man and if Hazlewood got a direct hit at the keeper's end, AB might have been in danger, very close!
Kane Richardson to de Villiers, 2 runs angled into AB who clips it in the gap towards fine leg for an easy two
Kane Richardson to de Villiers, 1 run charges down the track, Richardson pitches it short and AB slaps it to deep midwicket
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run full outside off, Amla smacks it down to mid off for another quick single. Starc tried a run out at bowler's end but Amla made it
Kane Richardson to de Villiers, 2 runs full toss on the pads, steered to the leg side for two more
Kane Richardson to de Villiers, 1 run whips the full ball with the wrists wide of deep midwicket but Smith runs quickly and gets there to keep it to one
Hazlewood to de Villiers, 2 runs short ball around off, slapped powerfully to deep midwicket again and they come back for the second quickly
Hazlewood to de Villiers, no run full and wide, he makes room and drives it to cover point at the edge of the circle
Hazlewood to de Villiers, 1 run stays back for the back of length ball and pulls it to the leg side. 50 for AB off just 32 deliveries
Hazlewood to Amla, no run swing and a miss! Amla drove well outside off without any footwork and just missed the outside edge!
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 run short ball and that's pulled to deep midwicket. That's his hundred, he takes the helmet off, acknowledges the crowd and gets a hug from AB
Hazlewood to de Villiers, 2 runs dropped, but it was a very tough chance! AB pulled the ball again, it was dipping on mid on where Marsh came in to catch but it was very low on his right side
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run back of length outside the off stump, tapped to backward point for one

Kane Richardson to de Villiers, OUT that's a loud appeal for lbw, umpire says it's out and AB reviews it! Bowden says there's nothing on Hot Spot, it's hitting him in line and is hitting the stumps too, AB has to go. AB had moved across a long way to the off side to slog the deli
Kane Richardson to Behardien, no run back of length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
Kane Richardson to Behardien, 1 run angled in this time towards leg, clipped to backward square leg for one
Kane Richardson to Amla, no run outside the off stump on length, steered to backward point
Kane Richardson to Amla, 1 run slogs it on the leg side in the air with the angle and it falls well short of deep midwicket
Hazlewood to Miller, no run beaten first ball! Short of length outside off with the angle, Miller is struck to his crease and pokes, and misses
Hazlewood to Miller, 1 run pitched up on the pads now, clipped away to leg for one
Hazlewood to Behardien, 1 leg bye angled in towards the pads, tucked to backward square leg for one

Hazlewood to Miller, no run fuller on the stumps, Miller pushes it back and sets off, Hazlewood stops with is left hand, switches the ball to right and throws it back, the ball hits Miller on the way who dives in
Hazlewood to Miller, 1 run fuller this time and it's whipped on the leg side for one
Starc to Miller, 1 run short of length outside off, sliced off the back foot on the off side
Starc to Behardien, 1 run fullish and well outside off, driven through the covers for one

Starc to Miller, OUT inswinging yorker does it, the finger goes up! Miller was struck on the crease as the yorker dipped and swung in, hit him on the front shoe in front of leg stump, was it going down leg? The umpire says it's out and Miller has a few words with the huddle that'
Starc to Philander, no run angled in from round the wicket, he defends it back
Starc to Philander, no run length delivery angled in towards the stumps, pushes it back again
Starc to Philander, 1 run wider outside the off stump, steered to deep point for one
Hazlewood to Philander, no run cuts it in from outside off, Philander defends it back
Hazlewood to Philander, 1 wide bangs in the bouncer outside off and it's too short, called a wide
Hazlewood to Philander, no run back of length outside off, pushes it on off and gets an inside edge onto his pads
Hazlewood to Philander, no run on length outside the off stump, pushes it down to mid off
Hazlewood to Philander, no run fuller on the stumps, tucked straight to midwicket
Hazlewood to Philander, no run full on the stumps, defends it back to the bowler
Hazlewood to Philander, no run shorter outside off, pulled to midwicket and not a single run off the bat in this over
Starc to Behardien, FOUR runs that's beautifully driven in the air and over the covers for four! It was pretty wide and he stretched out for the ball to drive it firmly
Starc to Behardien, no run angled in this time and defends it back to Starc
Starc to Behardien, 1 run low full toss well outside off, thick edge rolls down to third man for one
Starc to Philander, no run makes some room and drives the full delivery down to mid off
Starc to Philander, no run bangs i the bouncer towards the leg side, not given a wide
Hazlewood to Behardien, 1 run hops back in the crease for the incoming delivery and pushes it to mid on for one
Hazlewood to Steyn, no run slightly full and wide, Steyn swings his arms to drive it to mid off
Hazlewood to Steyn, no run makes room to pull the short ball but sways out of the line
Hazlewood to Steyn, FOUR runs makes room again for the short delivery and slaps it down the ground over mid on for four
Hazlewood to Steyn, SIX runs another one, no that goes all the way! Made room on the leg side, it was a straight delivery and he smacked it down the ground for a clean six
Hazlewood to Steyn, 2 runs full on the pads, driven down wide of long on in the gap for two. There's a direct hit at the bowler's end, it's gone to the third umpire and he's home easily
Starc to Behardien, 1 leg bye shuffles across to the off side to scoop the ball behind square on leg and gets an inside edge on the pads. Umpire says it's a leg bye
Starc to Morkel, no run inswinging yorker towards middle and leg, the bat comes down just in time to block and the ball misses the stumps by a whisker!
Starc to Morkel, no run outside the off stump on length, Morkel swings and misses
Starc to Morkel, no run fuller and wider, pushed to point off the front foot
Starc to Morkel, no run inswinging low full toss just outside off, steered to deep cover for one
Hazlewood to Behardien, FOUR runs slogged on the leg side for four! It was fullish on the leg side and Behardien smacked it wide of deep midwicket for four
Hazlewood to Behardien, no run short ball outside off, he waits for it for the ramp shot but misses

10pm Looks like Imran Tahir is not coming out to bat, he has an injury, and Australia have won by 73 runs, series lead 2-1. Their bowlers started very well, both Hazlewood and Starc. Amla was fighting for South Africa with a hundred, they had a chance till de Villiers was there, but Aus
Australia won by 73 runs
Player of the match is Steven Smith, AUS
